###Shapefile downloaded from ESRI, created by David Smith, Readlands Univ. 

https://univredlands.maps.arcgis.com/home/webmap/viewer.html?useExisting=1&layers=335a6b9b0f3248e7bf7d3938dafd62c4&layerId=0

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(here)
library(mapview)
library(mapedit)
library(leaflet)

```

Read in the data and check it out
```{r}

tet_shore <- st_read(dsn = here("spatial/raw_data_"), layer = "shorelines2011")

mapview(tet_shore, zcol = "type") #Appears to be missing some of the lines?
```

Try the other data file that Dave sent

```{r}
tet_shore_2 <- st_read(dsn = here("spatial/raw_data_"), layer = "shorelines2011_2")

mapview(tet_shore, zcol = "type")

```

Still missing lines - check out what Benoit sends (might be more recent too)
